title: Gauge
snippet: A value within a range

title: Density
snippet: Distribution of a variable

title: Bar + Trend
snippet: Trendlines across Categorical Values

title: Bar
snippet: Distribution of numerical values across subjects.

title: Boxplot
snippet: Median, Upper & Lower Quartiles, Interquartile Range... lotta values

title: Bubble
snippet: Distribution of numerical values across subjects.

title: Diverging Histogram
snippet: Comparing & contrasting a few categorical values

title: Donut
snippet: Parts of a whole, with a 'missing' center.

title: Grouped Bar
snippet: Comparing distinct categories across several variable types and values.

title: Grouped Stacked Bar
snippet: Comparing categorical values, revealing the total at each category.

title: Heatmap
snippet: Color-Encoded value comparison across 2 categories.

title: Line
snippet: An ordered and joined change-of-value across a continuum.

title: Multi-Line
snippet: Comparing multiple line plots

title: Packed Circles
snippet: Hierarchical architecture revealed.

title: Pie
snippet: Parts of a whole

title: Stacked Area
snippet: Distribution of several values, revealing the each value uniquely as well as the combined total of both values at each point in a series.

title: Sunburst
snippet: Hierarchical relationships and values revealed through a radial layout.

title: Timeline
snippet: Points revealed across a time series.

title: Dendogram
snippet: Networked nodes with a root, branches, and leaves.

title: Tree
snippet: Hierarchical Structure and values represented as nested rectangles.

title: Slope
snippet: Comparing changes in value between two discrete points across several elements.

title: Ridgeline
snippet: Comparing the distribution of a value between several groups.
